title: Clothing and Fashion 1
sentences: I am wearing a blue shirt today.
Do you like my new jacket?
ist mir leider viel zu lang.
The pants are unfortunately much too long for me.
She is wearing a beautiful dress.
Tragen Sie im Winter oft einen
Do you often wear a coat in winter?
I need new shoes for work.
Have you seen my red socks?
Im Sommer trage ich gerne ein
In summer I like wearing a T-shirt.
The skirt really suits you well.
I am putting on a warm sweater.
I am tying the scarf around my neck.
Draußen ist es kalt, nimm deine
It's cold outside, take your gloves with you.
The glasses are on the table.
I need a new belt for my pants.
Is he wearing a tie today?
The suit is perfect for the wedding.
Your blouse is made of very fine silk.
I am putting on my boots because it's raining.
The children are wearing colorful beanies.
I forgot my handbag in the restaurant.
Do you have an umbrella with you?
war ein Geschenk von meinem Vater.
The watch was a gift from my father.
Ich kaufe mir ein neues Paar
I am buying myself a new pair of jeans.
